title: Add Cypress component testing
description: Add a Cypress component testing configuration to an existing project. Cypress v10.7.0 or higher is required.

project.description: The name of the project to add cypress component testing configuration to
project.x-prompt: What project should we add Cypress component testing to?

generateTests.description: Generate default component tests for existing components in the project
generateTests.x-prompt: Automatically generate tests for components declared in this project?

buildTarget.description: A build target used to configure Cypress component testing in the format of `project:target[:configuration]`. The build target should be an angular app. If not provided we will try to infer it from your projects usage.
